text: Aaliyah is the third and final studio album by American R&B; recording artist Aaliyah. It was released on July 7, 2001, by Blackground Records and Virgin Records. It was Aaliyah's last album to have been released during her lifetime. She had died in a plane crash the August of the same year. == Reviews == == Track listing == == Personnel == Credits are adapted from the album's liner notes. * Aaliyah – executive producer, vocals * Jonathan Adler – assistant engineer * The Black Orchestra – strings * Stevie Blacke – strings * Ron Blake – horn * Chandler Bridges – assistant engineer * Bud'da – creative partner, mixing, producer * Michael Conrader – engineer * Gemma Corfield – A&R; * Sean Cruse – guitar * J.
